text:
Rep. @Jim_Jordan asks if protests should be limited.

Dr. Anthony Fauci: "I'm not going to opine on limiting anything. I'm telling you what it is the danger is. You can make your own conclusion about that. You should stay away from crowds no matter where the crowds are." https://t.co/DfgmahK35F
